tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE historical_data (
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    data_value FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE device_metrics (
    device_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    cpu_usage FLOAT,
    memory_usage FLOAT,
    network_usage FLOAT,
    PRIMARY KEY(device_id, timestamp)
);

CREATE TABLE IoT_Device_Data (
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    data_value FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE performance_metrics (
    device_id INT,
    metric_name VARCHAR,
    metric_value FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES device_info(device_id)
);

CREATE TABLE historical_data (
  device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  temperature FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE device_info (
  device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location TEXT,
  firmware_version TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE performance_metrics (
  timestamp TIMESTAMP PRIMARY KEY,
  device_id INT,
  latency FLOAT,
  memory_usage FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE device_errors (
  error_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  device_id INT,
  error_message TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE data_archive (
  archive_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  archive_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  data TEXT
)
